teamA-blockers.jql: project = PE AND cf[12001] = "Team A" AND updatedDate > -7d AND priority = Blocker

teamB-blockers.jql: project = PE AND cf[12001] = "Team B" AND updatedDate > -7d AND priority = Blocker

issuecountA.title: Remaining issues for Team A's sprint

counts.label: In Peer Review
counts.jql: assignee in ("anthony.romano@soul-cycle.com", steve.komae, "sam.purcell@soul-cycle.com", "sloan.mergler@soul-cycle.com", beau.bouchard, allison.aspis, adiaz, mmera, michael.esposito) AND status in ("Peer Review") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

counts.label: In Progress
counts.jql: assignee in ("anthony.romano@soul-cycle.com", steve.komae, "sam.purcell@soul-cycle.com", "sloan.mergler@soul-cycle.com", beau.bouchard, allison.aspis, adiaz, mmera, michael.esposito) AND status in ("In Requirements", "In Development") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

counts.label: To Do
counts.jql: assignee in ("anthony.romano@soul-cycle.com", steve.komae, "sam.purcell@soul-cycle.com", "sloan.mergler@soul-cycle.com", beau.bouchard, allison.aspis, adiaz, mmera, michael.esposito) AND status in ("On Hold", Open, "Ready for Dev") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

counts.label: Pending Release / Done
counts.jql: assignee in ("anthony.romano@soul-cycle.com", steve.komae, "sam.purcell@soul-cycle.com", "sloan.mergler@soul-cycle.com", beau.bouchard, allison.aspis, adiaz, mmera, michael.esposito) AND status in (Closed, COMPLETE, "QA PASSED", "Verified in QA") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

issuecountB.title: Remaining issues for Team B's sprint

counts.label: In Peer Review
counts.jql: assignee in (vince.donofrio, "matt.shyman@soul-cycle.com", darren.lee, "Kevin.Bulvanoski@soul-cycle.com", "ash.kamel@soul-cycle.com", greg.weissberg, "david.goodman@soul-cycle.com", james.lyon, mliriano, csuriel, shilario) AND status in ("Peer Review") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

counts.label: In Progress
counts.jql: assignee in (vince.donofrio, "matt.shyman@soul-cycle.com", darren.lee, "Kevin.Bulvanoski@soul-cycle.com", "ash.kamel@soul-cycle.com", greg.weissberg, "david.goodman@soul-cycle.com", james.lyon, mliriano, csuriel, shilario) AND status in ("In Requirements", "In Development") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

counts.label: To Do
counts.jql: assignee in (vince.donofrio, "matt.shyman@soul-cycle.com", darren.lee, "Kevin.Bulvanoski@soul-cycle.com", "ash.kamel@soul-cycle.com", greg.weissberg, "david.goodman@soul-cycle.com", james.lyon, mliriano, csuriel, shilario) AND status in ("On Hold", Open, "Ready for Dev") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()

counts.label: Pending Release / Done
counts.jql: assignee in (vince.donofrio, "matt.shyman@soul-cycle.com", darren.lee, "Kevin.Bulvanoski@soul-cycle.com", "ash.kamel@soul-cycle.com", greg.weissberg, "david.goodman@soul-cycle.com", james.lyon, mliriano, csuriel, shilario)  AND status in (Closed, COMPLETE, "QA PASSED", "Verified in QA") AND project="PE" AND sprint in openSprints()
